verses.text: \w What|strong="H2896"\w* needeth \w a|strong="H3205"\w* man \w to|strong="H3205"\w* seek things \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* above \w him|strong="H3205"\w*, whereas \w he|strong="H3117"\w* knoweth not \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* profitable \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3117"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3117"\w* pilgrimage, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* passeth like \w a|strong="H3205"\w* shadow? \w Or|strong="H3117"\w* \w who|strong="H3205"\w* can tell \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* under \w the|strong="H3205"\w* sun?

\w A|strong="H5414"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* name \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* precious ointments: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day \w of|strong="H1004"\w* death \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w one’s|strong="H3605"\w* birth.

\w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w go|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H6440"\w* mourning, \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H6440"\w* feasting: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3820"\w* put \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w mind|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* end \w of|strong="H6440"\w* all, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* living thinketh \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* come.

Anger \w is|strong="H3820"\w* better than laughter: because by \w the|strong="H1004"\w* sadness \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1004"\w* countenance \w the|strong="H1004"\w* \w mind|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1004"\w* offender \w is|strong="H3820"\w* corrected.

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* where there \w is|strong="H0376"\w* mourning, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w* where there \w is|strong="H0376"\w* mirth.

\w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* better \w to|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* rebuked \w by|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* wise \w man|strong="H3684"\w*, \w than|strong="H1571"\w* \w to|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* deceived \w by|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* flattery \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* crackling \w of|strong="H3820"\w* thorns burning under \w a|strong="H3588"\w* pot, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* laughter \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* fool: \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* vanity.

Oppression troubleth \w the|strong="H1697"\w* wise, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w shall|strong="H1697"\w* destroy \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w strength|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H7307"\w* \w heart|strong="H7307"\w*.

Better \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* end \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* speech \w than|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* beginning. Better \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* patient \w man|strong="H3684"\w* \w than|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* presumptuous.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* quickly angry: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* anger resteth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* bosom \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* fool.

Say not: \w What|strong="H2896"\w* thinkest thou \w is|strong="H2451"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* cause \w that|strong="H7200"\w* former times were \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w they|strong="H7200"\w* \w are|strong="H5973"\w* now? \w for|strong="H8121"\w* this manner \w of|strong="H5159"\w* question \w is|strong="H2451"\w* foolish.

\w Wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w with|strong="H3588"\w* riches \w is|strong="H2451"\w* \w more|strong="H3588"\w* profitable, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* bringeth \w more|strong="H3588"\w* \w advantage|strong="H3504"\w* \w to|strong="H3701"\w* \w them|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* see \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sun.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* wisdom \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* defence, \w so|strong="H0834"\w* money \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* defence: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* learning \w and|strong="H0430"\w* wisdom excel \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w give|strong="H7200"\w* life \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* possesseth \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Consider|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w works|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w can|strong="H7200"\w* correct whom \w he|strong="H0310"\w* hath despised.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* good \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w enjoy|strong="H7200"\w* good \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* beware beforehand \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w for|strong="H3117"\w* God hath \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* \w may|strong="H3117"\w* not \w find|strong="H7200"\w* \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w just|strong="H6664"\w* complaint.

These \w things|strong="H1961"\w* also \w I|strong="H4100"\w* saw \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* days \w of|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* vanity: \w A|strong="H1961"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* perisheth \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* justice, \w and|strong="H6662"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* wicked \w man|strong="H6662"\w* liveth \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w long|strong="H4100"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* wickedness.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w over|strong="H4100"\w* just: \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* wise \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* necessary, lest thou \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w stupid|strong="H5530"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* overmuch wicked: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* foolish, lest thou die \w before|strong="H0854"\w* thy \w time|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w It|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* good \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou shouldst hold \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w just|strong="H0834"\w*, yea \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H1961"\w* withdraw \w not|strong="H1961"\w* thy hand: \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* feareth \w God|strong="H2451"\w*, neglecteth nothing.
Wisdom hath strengthened \w the|strong="H0834"\w* wise \w more|strong="H0369"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* ten princes \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* city.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w just|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* upon earth, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* doth good, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* sinneth \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* do \w not|strong="H3588"\w* apply thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* words \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* spoken: lest \w perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* thou hear thy servant reviling thee.
\w For|strong="H3605"\w* thy conscience knoweth \w that|strong="H3605"\w* thou also hast often \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w* evil \w of|strong="H4480"\w* others.

\w I|strong="H7350"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* tried all \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* wisdom. \w I|strong="H7350"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* said: \w I|strong="H7350"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* wise: \w and|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* departed farther \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*,

Much more than \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w*: \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H1245"\w* great depth, who \w shall|strong="H3045"\w* \w find|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w*?

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* surveyed \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w things|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*, \w to|strong="H3820"\w* know, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* consider, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* seek \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H3820"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w reason|strong="H0834"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* know \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wickedness \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fool, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* error \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* imprudent:

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w* more bitter than death, \w who|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hunter’s snare, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* heart \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* net, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* hands are bands. \w He|strong="H0259"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* pleaseth \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* escape \w from|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*: \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H0259"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* sinner, \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* \w be|strong="H0259"\w* \w caught|strong="H4672"\w* \w by|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*.

Lo \w this|strong="H0428"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, said Ecclesiastes, \w weighing|strong="H0259"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w thing|strong="H0259"\w* \w after|strong="H5315"\w* \w another|strong="H0259"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w might|strong="H0834"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w out|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* account,

\w Which|strong="H0834"\w* \w yet|strong="H4672"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* soul seeketh, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*. \w One|strong="H2088"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w among|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* thousand \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w* \w among|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* all \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.
Only this I have found, that God made man right, and he hath entangled himself with an infinity of questions. Who is as the wise man? and who hath known the resolution of the word?
